projects.title: Web Builder | Personal Project
projects.description: Developed a configurable web page builder framework to easily render the static and dynamic web pages just by changing the JSON layouts. It also plugged with Authentication, Authorization, Mail, SMS services to enable the basic security and communication layer. Future scope is to make it more flexible to drive any workflow using workflow template concept

projects.title: Citrix Workspace For Chrome OS And Browser | @ Citrix, Bangalore
projects.description: Citrix digital workspace solutions empower companies to securely deliver the apps and data people need to be as productive as possible—no matter where they work or which devices they use.

projects.title: Citrix Telemetry and Analytics | @ Citrix, Bangalore
projects.description: Citrix digital workspace solutions empower companies to securely deliver the apps and data people need to be as productive as possible—no matter where they work or which devices they use.

projects.title: Intelli-Space Precision Medicine | @ Philips, Bangalore
projects.description: ISPM transforms and enhances the Tumor Board process. It streamlines preparation, enhances review and analysis,and empowers the cancer care team to reach clinical treatment decisions based upon rich dashboards, diagnostic images, reports, and structured patient data. The sessions can be attended virtually or in-person.

projects.title: Radiation Oncology Orchestrator | @ Philips, Bangalore
projects.description: This Application helps to manage complexity, improve efficiency, and enable operational excellence in radiotherapy departments. It also provides a harmonized way of working, integrating applications and automating workflow to help reduce the amount of time it takes from receiving a patient referral to the start of their treatment

projects.title: Spine Invoice processing | @ Infosys, Bangalore
projects.description: Spine is a Windows service developed to read e-mails from mail servers automatically and send acknowledgement mails after invoice processing, it also delivers a vast range of choices to user like saving mails in their physical drives, allowing only required file extension attachments to download and sending e-mails through web app.
